attributes.action: Appose PPO banning dogs from the beach at Colwyn Bay  2023.
attributes.additional_details: Make this process something that should only be introduced as a last resort and prevent the council from being able to pass this internally without having suitable gate keepers that act in the public interest.
attributes.background: Would like a senior member of the government to raise this issue with Conwy Borough Conwy. This is an order that has been proposed to be introduced without evidence to justify the requirement. This is a misuse of legislation and we need the government to hold the council to account and prevent this

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for, and We can't accept petitions which call for actions with regard to specific organisations, including specific local authorities.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You could raise this case with your local MP or the Government department responsible for local government.

You can find contact details for your local MP here: https://members.parliament.uk/FindYourMP

And you can find contact details for the Department for Levelling Up, Housing and Communities here: https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/department-for-levelling-up-housing-and-communities
